text: The 1927–28 season was Manchester City F.C.'s thirty-seventh season of league football and second season in the Football League Second Division, which they won for the fourth time in their history. ==Team Kit== {| border="0" | |} ==Football League Second Division== === Results summary === === Reports === {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !Date !Opponents !H / A !Venue
